plot: A wealthy young man looking for a famous painter ends up finding more than just a painter, a man that will give him a life lesson.
title: Cómo conocí a Pedro Villegas
plot_es: A wealthy young man looking for a famous painter ends up finding more than just a painter, a man that will give him a life lesson.
plot_en: A wealthy young man looking for a famous painter ends up finding more than just a painter, a man that will give him a life lesson.
